byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: LONDON, April 2--Increased British competition with United States trade interests in Central and South America is expected to result from a decision taken today to extend the bid for world markets to Latin America....

headline.main: Britain to Spur Trade Rivalry With U.S.; Export Drive Aimed at Americas' Markets

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 2--Increased British competition with United States trade interests in Central and South America is expected to result from a decision taken today to extend the bid for world markets to Latin America.
